plot: On the 4th of July, an agoraphobic man is coerced from his isolation and left to fend for himself in public as he finds his way home.
title: Fourth
plot_es: On the 4th of July, an agoraphobic man is coerced from his isolation and left to fend for himself in public as he finds his way home.
plot_en: On the 4th of July, an agoraphobic man is coerced from his isolation and left to fend for himself in public as he finds his way home.
